amendment.description: At the end of title I, add the following: SEC. __. AUTHORIZATION OF FEDERALLY MAINTAINED TRIBUTARY CHANNELS AS PART OF CHANNEL SYSTEM. A project that has been assumed for maintenance by the Secretary under any authority granted by Congress shall-- (1) be treated as a project authorized by Congress; and (2) be planned, operated, managed, or modified in a manner consistent with authorized projects.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Babin amendment (A004) Agreed to by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A004) offered by Mr. Babin.
